scripts.init:db: npx prisma db push && npx prisma generate
scripts.download:address:total: npm run init:path && ts-node src/main.ts download address total
scripts.download:address:acc: npm run init:path && ts-node src/main.ts download address accumulation
scripts.download:address:daily: npm run init:path && ts-node src/main.ts download address daily
scripts.download:summary:total: npm run init:path && ts-node src/main.ts download position_summary total
scripts.download:summary:monthly: npm run init:path && ts-node src/main.ts download position_summary monthly
scripts.download:zipcode:total: npm run init:path && ts-node src/main.ts download zipcode
scripts.update:address:daily: ts-node src/main.ts download address daily && ts-node src/main.ts update address daily
scripts.setup:address:acc: npm run download:address:acc && npm run update:address:acc
scripts.setup:all: npm run download:address:total && npm run download:address:acc && docker-compose up -d && npm run init:db && npm run import:address && npm run update:address:acc
